Package sg.edu.ntu.cz2002.grp3.util

Class IO

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.cz2002.grp3.util.IO
public class IO
extends java.lang.Object
The Class providing static functions for getting various user input and printing of lists.
Author:
Guat Kwan, Wei Xing, Ashton, Yi Bai, Zhe Ming

    • getPrintOptions

      public static int getPrintOptions​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String endText, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> options)
      Prints the options available and get choice from user.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the menu
      endText - the text representing the final option
      options - the list of options to print
      Returns:
      the user's choice
